name: Opuntia Cactus
description:
Opuntia Microdasys is a species of cactus popularly known as Bunny Ears Cactus. Its characteristic for having small dense clusters of tiny hairs, they can be white, yellow or red.
It has greek etymology: mikros "small" dasus "hairy". It typically grows in desert habitats, its spines and hairs are a very suitable structure to capture ambient humidity.
